0001_nightfall.description: A dreadful blade that extinguishes all light and wreathes its wielder in darkness.
0001_nightfall.name: Nightfall

0003_shamblevault_coffin.description: A coffin used to summon undead creatures and press them into service.
0003_shamblevault_coffin.name: Shamblevault Coffin

0004_harrowshrike_deathmask.description: A vampiric mask that strikes fear into the heart of your enemies.
0004_harrowshrike_deathmask.name: Harrowshrike Deathmask

0005_stormbreaker.description: An indomitable tower shield imbued with tempest's fury
0005_stormbreaker.name: Stormbreaker

0006_sea_tyrants_scales.description: Scale armor, reducing damage taken and imbuing you with the hybris of a Leviathan.
0006_sea_tyrants_scales.name: Sea Tyrants Scales

0007_cloak_of_photosynthesis.description: A cloak that slowly heals you when in direct sunlight
0007_cloak_of_photosynthesis.name: Cloak Of Photosynthesis

0008_scythe_of_the_long_march.description: A grisly weapon allowing you to endure grave wounds and march on seemingly forever.
0008_scythe_of_the_long_march.name: Scythe Of The Long March

0009_blood_toll_bracers.description: Blood-stained relics that enable you to retaliate when getting hit.
0009_blood_toll_bracers.name: Blood Toll Bracers

0010_eye_of_obliteration.description: An eye replacement enabling you to turn enemies into dust by looking at them.
0010_eye_of_obliteration.name: Eye Of Obliteration

0011_graveblade1.description: A sword dealing more damage to already wounded creatures.
0011_graveblade1.name: Graveblade +1

0011_graveblade2.description: A sword dealing more damage to already wounded creatures.
0011_graveblade2.name: Graveblade +2

0011_graveblade3.description: A sword dealing more damage to already wounded creatures.
0011_graveblade3.name: Graveblade +3

0012_defuser_harness.description: Paddened and enchanted armor offering protection from explosions.
0012_defuser_harness.name: Defuser Harness

0013_shoreclaimer.description: A battleaxe empowering you during the first round of combat.
0013_shoreclaimer.name: Shoreclaimer

0014_dreamers_prison.description: A morbid artifact allowing you to imprison a creature within the head's dream.
0014_dreamers_prison.name: Dreamers Prison

0015_sunflower_scepter.description: A spell focus strengthening radiant damage and granting two powerful solar spells.
0015_sunflower_scepter.name: Sunflower Scepter

0016_harrowshrike_harness.description: Winged armor that allows you to silently glide through the air.
0016_harrowshrike_harness.name: Harrowshrike Harness

0017_griefplate.description: A haunted plate armor enshrouded by wailing ghosts, damaging all living creatures around you.
0017_griefplate.name: Griefplate

0018_gatebreaker_gauntlets.description: Heavy gauntlets allowing you to crush foes with your fists and break through doors, walls and castle gates.
0018_gatebreaker_gauntlets.name: Gatebreaker Gauntlets

0019_osseous_mask.description: A bone mask, granting you telepathy and the ability to target two allies with a single spell.
0019_osseous_mask.name: Osseous Mask

0020_stormstrider_boots.description: Boots allowing you to stride through air and granting resistance to lightning damage.
0020_stormstrider_boots.name: Stormstrider Boots

0022_ossian_crown.description: A crown granting the ability to cast animate dead on a beast.
0022_ossian_crown.name: Ossian Crown

0024_ancestral_fragment.description: A piece of magical rock that lets you commune with your ancestors.
0024_ancestral_fragment.name: Ancestral Fragment

0025_lightbringer_torch.description: A magical torch that emits magical sunlight, banishes darkness and heals allies.
0025_lightbringer_torch.name: Lightbringer Torch

0026_molten_core.description: A Magma Dragon's heart, utilized to invoke different fiery boons.
0026_molten_core.name: Molten Core

0028_fleshgrafter_workgloves.description: Summon a giant mummified arm and crush your foes with it.
0028_fleshgrafter_workgloves.name: Fleshgrafter Workgloves

0002_devils_decksweeper.description: An overgrown pistol cursed by a devil of the sea
0002_devils_decksweeper.name: Devils Decksweeper

0031_gravewardens_bell.description: This bell grants communion with the Deathshroud, allowing you to partake in its holy silence and grant its burial shroud.
0031_gravewardens_bell.name: Gravewardens Bell

0032_crescent_moon.description: Upon falling unconscious, the sword's ghost possesses you, fighting on your behalf.
0032_crescent_moon.name: Crescent Moon

0034_cloak_of_billowing_ash.description: Swiftly move as a coiling cloud of ash-smoke, wind-fast and untouchable.
0034_cloak_of_billowing_ash.name: Cloak Of Billowing Ash

0033_wiredevil.description: A wind-up grenade unleashing a torrent of razor-wire when activated.
0033_wiredevil.name: Wiredevil

0035_dreamraker.description: Allows you to haunt sleeping creatures, damaging them but not rousing them from their slumber.
0035_dreamraker.name: Dreamraker

0036_vermin_crown.description: Allows you to summon swarms of vermin, heeding your every command.
0036_vermin_crown.name: Vermin Crown

0037_grovekeepers_promise.description: Activating this magical shield, you become rooted to the earth, nigh impossible to shift, as thorny vines lash at your enemies.
0037_grovekeepers_promise.name: Grovekeepers Promise

0038_seed_of_renewal.description: The seedling of a magical tree that grows healing fruit and blesses those that sleep near it.
0038_seed_of_renewal.name: Seed Of Renewal

0039_blade_sage_scroll.description: Allows you to store and retrieve weapons within, as well as permantently strengthens your bladework upon careful study.
0039_blade_sage_scroll.name: Blade Sage Scroll

0040_jungle_monarch.description: Increases the chance to score critical hits and always deals maximal weapon damage against Huge and larger creatures.
0040_jungle_monarch.name: Jungle Monarch

0041_lantern_of_waning_hope.description: A flickering lantern providing aid when you are at death's door.
0041_lantern_of_waning_hope.name: Lantern Of Waning Hope

0042_rothail_shortbow.description: Mud-dripping short bow infecting targets with Bog Rot, dealing necrotic damage over time.
0042_rothail_shortbow.name: Rothail Shortbow

0043_conquerors_chalice.description: Imbibe a worty enemy's life blood to increase your maximum hit points and terrorize its kindred.
0043_conquerors_chalice.name: Conquerors Chalice

0044_ghoulskin_gloves.description: Strangle and mangle humanoids with the low chance of paralyzing them.
0044_ghoulskin_gloves.name: Ghoulskin Gloves

0045_bridgehead.description: This armor lets you either withstand a single instance of tremendous damage or pay a blood toll and pay it back.
0045_bridgehead.name: Bridgehead

0046_mourners_frock.description: You gain access to two of the Mourner's signature spells, allowing you to stalk the mists in style.
0046_mourners_frock.name: Mourners Frock

0049_foremans_flask.description: Drink from the flask to benefit from a short rest. Do so secretly to also gain 2d10 temporary hit points.
0049_foremans_flask.name: Foremans Flask

0049_wrathfire_talisman.description: Wreath yourself in scorching Wrathfire, granting you increased damage and resistance at the low cost of risking mindless rage.
0049_wrathfire_talisman.name: Wrathfire Talisman

0047_beast_hunters_cowl.description: Allows you to cast a spell that highlights vulnerable prey and increases your chance of a critical hit against it.
0047_beast_hunters_cowl.name: Beast-Hunter's Cowl

0048_fadesilk_shroud.description: Upon being discovered by a creature, possibly erase yourself from a creature's perception and memory.
0048_fadesilk_shroud.name: Fadesilk Shroud

0050_brawlers_eagerness.description: Gain a bonus to your initiative roll and possibly to your movement speed and number of attacks.
0050_brawlers_eagerness.name: Brawlers Eagerness

0051_blessed_bindings.description: Gain a damage resistance of your choice, as well as some light protection against undead or fiends.
0051_blessed_bindings.name: Blessed Bindings

0053_robes_of_reflection.description: A robe best suited for the Monk class, allowing them to regain Ki points by reflecting on their failure.
0053_robes_of_reflection.name: Robes Of Reflection

0052_dark_shepherd_cursed.description: Regular Dark Shepherd but with the curse text added.
0052_dark_shepherd_cursed.name: Dark Shepherd Cursed

0052_dark_shepherd.description: Buffs your undead minions and grants you necromantic spell slots.
0052_dark_shepherd.name: Dark Shepherd

0054_slumbering_huskblade.description: A crude lump of metal transforming into a blade upon killing a creature with it.
0054_slumbering_huskblade.name: Huskblade (Slumbering)

0055_awoken_huskblade.description: The stronger the creature slain with the Slumbering Husk Blade, the mightier its awoken form.
0055_awoken_huskblade.name: Huskblade (Awoken)

0056_hiveheart.description: In turn for infesting your body, the skittering swarm helps out where it can.
0056_hiveheart.name: Hiveheart

0057_sullen_knights_helmet.description: A slightly cursed helmet, whose benefits might outweigh the drawbacks.
0057_sullen_knights_helmet.name: Sullen Knight's Helmet

0058_bascinet_of_ancient_tactica.description: At the start of each combat, you learn two maneuvers and the have option to adapt your fighting style.
0058_bascinet_of_ancient_tactica.name: Bascinet Of Ancient Tactica

0059_bottlesnatcher_imp.description: A drunk Imp residing in a bottle, able to procure other bottles in the vicinity.
0059_bottlesnatcher_imp.name: Bottlesnatcher Imp

0060_heart_of_iron.description: A mechanical heart that lets you awaken a suit of heavy armor, turning it into a mighty servant.
0060_heart_of_iron.name: Heart Of Iron

0061_spelldrinker_scroll.description: A scroll used to trap a spell within upon it being cast, storing it for later use.
0061_spelldrinker_scroll.name: Spelldrinker Scroll

0062_three_feather_tricorne.description: A hat that lets you fly, calm everyone down or summon a drunk parrot.
0062_three_feather_tricorne.name: Three-Feathered Tricorne

0063_nightbloom_chalice.description: A chalic offering a healing nectar every night, can also be used to befriend local wildlife.
0063_nightbloom_chalice.name: Nightbloom Chalice

0064_boreal_bulwark.description: A shield allowing you to channel your willpower to negate damage. It also inflicts harm upon fey creatures.
0064_boreal_bulwark.name: Boreal Bulwark

0065_duskdreamers_diadem.description: An etheral diadem allowing you to regain a spell slot at dusk and enabling you to magically put a creature to sleep, healing or harming it.
0065_duskdreamers_diadem.name: Duskdreamer's Diadem

0066_death_ink.description: Mark a creature of your choice as the target of your hunt and gain powerful boni that assist you in this pursuit.
0066_death_ink.name: Death Ink

0067_whispermaw_strain.description: Parasitic organism whose whispers can regenerate spell slots and charm enemies.
0067_whispermaw_strain.name: Whispermaw Strain

0068_magmatic_molasses.description: Creates a protective layer of cooled lava that hinders mobility but significantly increases defense.
0068_magmatic_molasses.name: Magmatic Molasses

0069_drought_draught.description: Creates an area of magical dryness that evaporates water and harms liquid or elemental creatures.
0069_drought_draught.name: Drought Draught

0070_crown_of_defiance.description: lets you ignore the result of an attack against you, a failed save or falling to 0 hit points once per day.
0070_crown_of_defiance.name: Crown Of Defiance

0071_hags_due.description: Lets you cast detect thoughts on an unconscious creature, as well as gain one of its proficiencies.
0071_hags_due.name: Hag's Due

0072_slimesword.description: An oozy sword that deals extra acid damage and can grapple enemies to dissolve them.
0072_slimesword.name: Slimesword

0073_visage_of_dismay.description: Draw strength from your allies' failures or chastise them to do better.
0073_visage_of_dismay.name: Visage Of Dismay

0074_dawnmartyr_pelerine.description: When an ally is hurt, you can take part of the damage, starting to burn to buff allies and damage enemies.
0074_dawnmartyr_pelerine.name: Dawnmartyr Pelerine

0075_grace_of_the_shade_court.description: Wearing the cowl enhances your charisma and allows you to diminish harm or fortify your resolve with regal grace.
0075_grace_of_the_shade_court.name: Grace Of The Shade Court

0076_mask_of_the_third_eye.description: This mask enhances your perception and intellect while granting powerful divinatory and defensive abilities.
0076_mask_of_the_third_eye.name: Mask Of The Third Eye

0077_windup_key.description: Use the Windup-Key to animate an object, with the option to either hasten it or blowing it up.
0077_windup_key.name: Windup Key

0078_enslaver_stake.description: An unholy stake, used to temporarily animate a dead humanoid or beast under the user's control.
0078_enslaver_stake.name: Enslaver Stake

0079_martyrs_ash.description: Apply to your skin to gain various resistances and the ability to sacrifice your hit points to prevent failed death saves.
0079_martyrs_ash.name: Martyr's Ash

0080_mind_tyrant.description: Buffs your spellcasting and enables you to psychically flay your enemies, causing them to suffer increased damage.
0080_mind_tyrant.name: Mind Tyrant

0082_convergence_crest.description: Cast spells of the same school in a specific sequence to achieve a powerful convergence
0082_convergence_crest.name: Convergence Crest

0083_ghostflicker_habit.description: Light Ghostflicker Candles to view the unseen and boost your spell save DC.
0083_ghostflicker_habit.name: Ghostflicker Habit

0084_reefs_splendour.description: Grow ephemereal corals to increase your AC, grant temporary hit points and resistance to cold damage.
0084_reefs_splendour.name: Reef's Splendour

0085_shield_of_the_sepulchral_saint.description: Summon and elevate an undead creature to act as your lieutnant.
0085_shield_of_the_sepulchral_saint.name: Shield of the Sepulchral Saint

0087_irontide_raidmask_1.description: War-Masks granting you immunity to fear, however eventually forcing you to confront that fear.
0087_irontide_raidmask_1.name: Irontide Raid-Mask

0087_irontide_raidmask_2.description: War-Masks granting you immunity to fear, however eventually forcing you to confront that fear.
0087_irontide_raidmask_2.name: Irontide Raid-Mask

0087_irontide_raidmask_3.description: War-Mask granting you immunity to fear, however eventually forcing you to confront that fear.
0087_irontide_raidmask_3.name: Irontide Raid-Mask

0088_fluttershade_habit.description: A comfortable hat, attracting moths and butterflies. Their whispers grant you access to more spells and can sooth your allies during a short rest.
0088_fluttershade_habit.name: Fluttershade Habit

0086_gravelord_scepter.description: Spellfocus boosting your necromancy spells, as well as buffing undead creatures under your control
0086_gravelord_scepter.name: Gravelord Scepter

0089_staff_of_multiple_minds.description: Allows you to prepare and cast an additional spell from the wizard spell list and possibly concentrate on two spells.
0089_staff_of_multiple_minds.name: Staff of Multiple Minds

0091_dark_promise.description: Should a creature triumph over you, rise again to haunt it.
0091_dark_promise.name: Dark Promise

0092_rod_of_the_silent_saint.description: Silently cast your spells and silence your enemies to prohibit them from using their voice or spells.
0092_rod_of_the_silent_saint.name: Rod of the Silent Saint

0093_sunscorched_shield.description: Grants resistance to fire damage, can be used to shield allies from fiery harm and to substitute a campfire.
0093_sunscorched_shield.name: Sun-Scorched Shield

0098_sphinx_key.description: Magical key that opens nonmagical locks if you can solve a riddle.
0098_sphinx_key.name: Sphinx Key

0099_killing_thought.description: Crystal blade that you can control with your mind.
0099_killing_thought.name: Killing Thought

0100_latchling_vial.description: Vial containing a parasite capable of creating an allied Animated Object.
0100_latchling_vial.name: Latchling Vial

0101_spookshroud.description: Spooky veil that lets you turn into a ghost.
0101_spookshroud.name: Spookshroud

0081_truthtaker.description: Behead a creature, carry its head around, talk to it.
0081_truthtaker.name: Truthtaker

0095_muspelhammer.description: Imprint a fiery rune unto a weapon or suit of armor, granting extra damage or fire resistance.
0095_muspelhammer.name: Muspelhammer

0094_trench_digger.description: Create fortified positions gain defensive boni while holding them.
0094_trench_digger.name: Trench Digger

0096_overseers_hardhat.description: Protects your noggin from non-magical projectiles other occupational hazards.
0096_overseers_hardhat.name: Overseers Hardhat

0097_potion_of_healing.description: Drink to regain an almost negligible amount of hit points.
0097_potion_of_healing.name: Potion of Healing

0097_potion_of_greater_healing.description: Drink to regain a minor amount of hit points.
0097_potion_of_greater_healing.name: Potion of Greater Healing

0097_potion_of_superior_healing.description: Drink to regain a respectable amount of hit points.
0097_potion_of_superior_healing.name: Potion of Superior Healing

0097_potion_of_supreme_healing.description: Drink to regain a large amount of hit points.
0097_potion_of_supreme_healing.name: Potion of Supreme Healing

0029_the_pilgrims_plate.description: Gain charges as you suffer damage, expend charges to gain damage resistances.
0029_the_pilgrims_plate.name: Pilgrim's Plate

0104_crows_perch.name: Crow's Perch
0104_crows_perch.description: Allows you to summon spectral crows, able to fulfill different purposes.

0103_hellwrights_hexcoil.name: Hellwright's Hexcoil
0103_hellwrights_hexcoil.description: Used to curse constructs and infernal war machines.

0102_serpents_scales.name: Serpent's Scales
0102_serpents_scales.description: Stealthy scale mail supporting serpentine sneaking.

0105_consciousmist_disperser.name: Consciousmist Disperser
0105_consciousmist_disperser.description: Contains intelligent mist enabling various methods of divination and communication.

0105_consciousmist_potion.name: Consciousmist Potion
0105_consciousmist_potion.description: A single dose of Consciousmist, granting methods of divination and communication.
